channel.title: Can anyone help me out here?
channel.description:
I am having trouble with my NPC's talking. I do everything right, log in, talk to my NPC and when my charcter is supposed to talk back, it logs me out. Is there anyway someone can tell me what I am doing wrong? My compiler has no error's.
Basically what I did was I made an NPC talk on my server and it compiled good. I made it so the NPC would say something and I would click continue and the player would respond, but the player doesn't respond. After the NPC talk's to me and I click continue it logs me straight out. Can someone please help me with this and tell me what I am doing wrong?

item.title: Can anyone help me out here?
item.dc:creator: @novar2 novar2
item.description:
@novar2 wrote:

I am having trouble with my NPC’s talking. I do everything right, log in, talk to my NPC and when my charcter is supposed to talk back, it logs me out. Is there anyway someone can tell me what I am doing wrong? My compiler has no error’s.

Basically what I did was I made an NPC talk on my server and it compiled good. I made it so the NPC would say something and I would click continue and the player would respond, but the player doesn’t respond. After the NPC talk’s to me and I click continue it logs me straight out. Can someone please help me with this and tell me what I am doing wrong?
